concept.title: Log Formats for Activity and Error logs

conbody.p: The following fields appear in activity.log, error.log, and associated alerts:Timestamp (in ISO time format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss) Process ID Log level of message (1 for major activity, 2 for notices, 3 for verbose) Error code, if any (defaults to 0 for no error) Class Name Line number Message
